content.query:
use Fno
go

-- Need to delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.Company
go

create external table dw.dCompany with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dCompany'
   ,data_source = ParquetStorage
   ,file_format = ParquetFormat
) as 
with distinctCompanies as (
  select distinct 
         upper(DataArea) as DataAreaId
        ,case when DataArea = 'DAT' then 'Do Not Use' else Name end as Name
    from raw.CompanyInfo
)
select cast(row_number() over(order by DataAreaId) as int) AS CompanyKey
      ,DataAreaId
      ,Name
  from distinctCompanies
 order by DataAreaId
go

select * from dw.dCompany
go
